SEARCH
Package io.papermc.paper.datacomponent.item.attribute

Interface AttributeModifierDisplay

All Known Subinterfaces:
AttributeModifierDisplay.Default, AttributeModifierDisplay.Hidden, AttributeModifierDisplay.OverrideText
@NullMarked @Experimental @NonExtendable public interface AttributeModifierDisplay
The display behavior for a dedicated attribute entry.
See Also:
  • DataComponentTypes.ATTRIBUTE_MODIFIERS
  • ItemAttributeModifiers.itemAttributes()

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    AttributeModifierDisplay.Default
    Default display for the attribute modifier, showing the statistic of its effect.
    static interface 
    AttributeModifierDisplay.Hidden
    Hidden statistics display for the attribute modifier.
    static interface 
    AttributeModifierDisplay.OverrideText
    Specifies an overridden text to show instead of the default behavior for the attribute modifier.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static AttributeModifierDisplay.Hidden
    hidden()
    Hides the statistics displayed by the attribute modifier.
    static AttributeModifierDisplay.OverrideText
    override(net.kyori.adventure.text.ComponentLike text)
    Override the statistics displayed by the attribute modifier to an arbitrary text.
    static AttributeModifierDisplay.Default
    reset()
    Reset any override of the text displayed by the attribute modifier to its default behavior displaying the statistics.

    • reset

      @Contract(value="-> new", pure=true) static AttributeModifierDisplay.Default reset()

      Returns:
      the new display behavior instance
